ISSUE_TEXT:
Your useful plugin has a small vertical offset (about 2px) in comparison to the other text in the status bar. Also the space between "CharCount" and "Reiner Text" could be bigger for aesthetical reasons, imho.
Happens on Gedit 3.30.1 on Ubuntu 18.10 with the Numix theme.
COMMENT_TEXT:
Thank you for pointing this out. Unfortunately, I do not see the same error on Gedit 3.28.1 on Ubuntu 18.04 with the BlackMATE theme.
I will look into it, but it may be a while before I have the time. If you find or can implement a fix, I welcome you to submit a pull-request for review!

ISSUE_TEXT:
If a show has an ampersand (&) in its name or description, the following error will occur:
    PHP Warning:  SimpleXMLElement::addChild(): unterminated entity reference

The tvshow.nfo file is still generated, but the field containing the ampersand will be empty.
